title: Curve
description: Declarative Event Publishing Library for Spring Boot Microservices - Kafka + DLQ + PII Protection + Transactional Outbox

items.title: Home
items.content_html: Simplify event-driven microservices with Curve - A declarative library for Spring Boot with Kafka, DLQ, PII protection, and transactional outbox pattern. Reduce boilerplate by 90%.

items.title: Annotations
items.content_html: Complete reference for Curve annotations including @PublishEvent, @PiiField, and more.

items.title: Custom Implementation
items.content_html: Learn how to extend Curve with custom event producers, context providers, and serializers.

items.title: Configuration Properties
items.content_html: Complete reference for all Curve configuration properties in application.yml

items.title: FAQ
items.content_html: Common questions and answers about Curve event publishing library

Complete Configuration Examples

items.title: Declarative Publishing
items.content_html: Learn how to use Curve's @PublishEvent annotation for declarative event publishing in Spring Boot with Kafka.

items.title: Failure Recovery
items.content_html: Learn how Curve handles failures with 3-tier recovery - main topic, DLQ, and backup strategies (S3, Local File).

items.title: Observability
items.content_html: Learn how to monitor Curve with Spring Boot Actuator, custom metrics, and health checks.

items.title: Overview
items.content_html: Comprehensive overview of Curve features including declarative publishing, PII protection, failure recovery, and observability.

items.title: PII Protection
items.content_html: Learn how Curve automatically protects PII (Personally Identifiable Information) with masking, encryption, and hashing.

items.title: Transactional Outbox
items.content_html: Learn how Curve implements the transactional outbox pattern for atomicity between database and event publishing.

items.title: First Event
items.content_html: Step-by-step tutorial for publishing your first event with Curve. Learn event payloads, metadata, and testing.

items.title: Installation
items.content_html: Complete installation guide for Curve event publishing library. Learn about dependencies, compatibility, and setup options.
